attributes.action: Ban anyone born after 2003 from ever buying cigarettes, to stop future smokers.
attributes.background: What are the benifits of smoking? All it does is shorten your lifespan and cause health issues. This petition is to put a law in place to prevent our future generation from getting addicted to smoking. It will mean that anyone born after 2003 will never be aloud to buy cigarettes. Stopping smoking!
